name: RSA 2
description: Let's start off with the most straightforward RSA attack... Try decrypting this {{url_for("rsa2.txt", display="rsa2.txt")}}. Here's the code used to generate the encryption: {{url_for("rsa2.py", display="rsa2.py")}}
hints: What missing information do we need to decrypt the message? How could we obtain that information?
author: Stanley Zhong
